'''''"Tupu's Lushness"''''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Duelist: Series III]]''. 

The achievements are earned by defeating the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Thundering Wayob Manifestation|text="Tupu's Lushness" &mdash; Vessel for the Will to Grow}} while completing challenge conditions.
